availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Mary Killkinny (Mentioned in a list of indictments from Bourbon Circuit Court)

body.p: Bourbon County, Kentucky, resident. Resident of Bourbon County, Kentucky, in 1859. Charged with keeping a disorderly house in Bourbon County in 1859. Charged with retailing liquor in Bourbon County in 1860. Charged with giving liquor to a free African American in Bourbon County in 1860. Charged with selling liquor to a free African American in Bourbon County in 1860.
